title: Project-Based Mathematics Education for Enhancing Engineering Design Problem-Solving Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Application of real-world engineering problem-solving scenarios linked to workplace contexts for employees.

learning_goals: Students can translate real-world engineering design problems into mathematical models
Students can systematically develop and execute problem-solving strategies through team-based projects
Students can quantitatively analyze design outcomes using digital tools (Excel, MATLAB, etc.)
Students can continuously improve the design process by incorporating formative assessment feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
